title: Game force repaired and is now acting strange.
body:
Hey guys, the new client abruptly interrupted a game load and started repairing itself when I was queued.  

It goes through the repair but now the client has a 20 min timer when do anything. How do you fix this?

replies.body:
The 20-minute timer is a *low-priority queue* which is added to an account after a *recent trend of disconnections* occurs. You can resolve the timer by queueing up for a game and waiting out the timer without going AFK when the queue eventually pops (after the 20min you'll enter queue).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for the help, it seems to have gone away after a while, thanks if this was you guys!
May do a clean reinstall later if there's risk of it doing it again.

As long as it doesn't count against my account or anything that's fine by me.
